filen vara. Öppna spelet och ändra i inställningarna till svenska. Ska funka med svenska nu.

      FAIRLIGHT your claims are false.

      Here is a public lesson in "trigger" fixing or OpenEvent-checks as
      we like to call them...

      ORIGINAL CODE:

      00f65d5f (06) ff15 24e11d01            CALL [0x11de124]
      00f65d65 (05) 35 d33fea19              XOR EAX, 0x19ea3fd3
      00f65d6a (01) 50                       PUSH EAX
      00f65d6b (04) 8d5424 18                LEA EDX, [ESP+0x18]
      00f65d6f (05) 68 74106301              PUSH 0x1631074
      00f65d74 (01) 52                       PUSH EDX
      00f65d75 (05) e8 83e91800              CALL 0x10f46fd
      00

This is correctly fixed. We were actually quite surprised and also
      embarrassed  on  behalf of FAIRLIGHT to see that they included the
      proof  against  themselves  right  there in their own NFO. You are
      simply wrong, your proper is invalid. You state that we "forgot to
      fix  lots  of  triggers"  and  as  proof you paste the code of our
      correctly fixed OpenEvent-check.

      You  also  give  a very vague consequence description "causing the
      game  to  have problems", what problems? There are no problems. We
      have  a  complete  winner case here FAIRLIGHT so please accept the
      facts and check the code we pasted.

      PS.  Please  give us credit for the mature tone we try here to set
      an  example and also please notice how we didn't even get into the
      whole  giant  exe  and UPX cover-up techniques that you so proudly
      exercise.
